## EMPTY\_PARAGRAPH\_NODE variable

A default empty object node. Useful for resetting the content of a prosemirror document.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
EMPTY_PARAGRAPH_NODE: {
    type: string;
    content: {
        type: string;
    }[];
}
```
